faq.pageDescription: Find answers to common questions or ask your own
faq.mainDescription: Find answers to common questions or submit your own inquiry. Our team is ready to help you with any questions about education recognition.
faq.tipSpecific: Be specific in your question for faster responses
faq.tipDetails: Include relevant details about your situation
faq.tipResponseTime: Response time is typically 2-3 business days
faq.beFirstToAsk: Be the first to ask a question using the form.
faq.questionPlaceholder: What would you like to know? Please be specific and include relevant details.
faq.questionSubmitted: Thank you! Your question has been received. We'll review and answer it shortly.

calculator.principle4: Calculation includes lectures, seminars and independent work
calculator.disclaimer: This calculator provides approximate values. For accurate calculation, please contact center specialists.
